verses.verse: And this <WH2088> is the thing <WH1697> that <WH834> thou shalt do <WH6213> unto them to hallow <WH6942> them, to minister unto me in the priest's office: <WH3547> Take <WH3947> one <WH259> young <WH1121> <WH1241> bullock, <WH6499> and two <WH8147> rams <WH352> without blemish, <WH8549>

And unleavened <WH4682> bread, <WH3899> and cakes <WH2471> unleavened <WH4682> tempered <WH1101> with oil, <WH8081> and wafers <WH7550> unleavened <WH4682> anointed <WH4886> with oil: <WH8081> of wheaten <WH2406> flour <WH5560> shalt thou make <WH6213> them.
And thou shalt put <WH5414> them into <WH5921> one <WH259> basket, <WH5536> and bring <WH7126> them in the basket, <WH5536> with the bullock <WH6499> and the two <WH8147> rams. <WH352>

And Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> thou shalt bring <WH7126> unto <WH413> the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation, <WH4150> and shalt wash <WH7364> them with water. <WH4325>

And thou shalt take <WH3947> <WH853> the garments, <WH899> and put upon <WH3847> <WH853> Aaron <WH175> <WH853> the coat, <WH3801> and the robe <WH4598> of the ephod, <WH646> and the ephod, <WH646> and the breastplate, <WH2833> and gird <WH640> him with the curious girdle <WH2805> of the ephod: <WH646>
And thou shalt put <WH7760> the miter <WH4701> upon <WH5921> his head, <WH7218> and put <WH5414> <WH853> the holy <WH6944> crown <WH5145> upon <WH5921> the miter. <WH4701>
Then shalt thou take <WH3947> <WH853> the anointing <WH4888> oil, <WH8081> and pour <WH3332> it upon <WH5921> his head, <WH7218> and anoint <WH4886> him.
And thou shalt bring <WH7126> his sons, <WH1121> and put coats upon <WH3847> <WH3801> them.

And thou shalt gird <WH2296> them with girdles, <WH73> Aaron <WH175> and his sons, <WH1121> and put <WH2280> the bonnets <WH4021> on them: and the priest's office <WH3550> shall be <WH1961> theirs for a perpetual <WH5769> statute: <WH2708> and thou shalt consecrate <WH4390> <WH3027> Aaron <WH175> and his sons. <WH1121>

And thou shalt cause <WH853> a bullock <WH6499> to be brought <WH7126> before <WH6440> the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation: <WH4150> and Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> shall put <WH5564> <WH853> their hands <WH3027> upon <WH5921> the head <WH7218> of the bullock. <WH6499>
And thou shalt kill <WH7819> <WH853> the bullock <WH6499> before <WH6440> the LORD, <WH3068> by the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation. <WH4150>

And thou shalt take <WH3947> of the blood <WH4480> <WH1818> of the bullock, <WH6499> and put <WH5414> it upon <WH5921> the horns <WH7161> of the altar <WH4196> with thy finger, <WH676> and pour <WH8210> all <WH3605> the blood <WH1818> beside <WH413> the bottom <WH3247> of the altar. <WH4196>

And thou shalt take <WH3947> <WH853> all <WH3605> the fat <WH2459> that covereth <WH3680> <WH853> the inwards, <WH7130> and the caul <WH3508> that is above <WH5921> the liver, <WH3516> and the two <WH8147> kidneys, <WH3629> and the fat <WH2459> that <WH834> is upon <WH5921> them, and burn <WH6999> them upon the altar. <WH4196>

But the flesh <WH1320> of the bullock, <WH6499> and his skin, <WH5785> and his dung, <WH6569> shalt thou burn <WH8313> with fire <WH784> without <WH4480> <WH2351> the camp: <WH4264> it <WH1931> is a sin offering. <WH2403>
Thou shalt also take <WH3947> one <WH259> ram; <WH352> and Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> shall put <WH5564> <WH853> their hands <WH3027> upon <WH5921> the head <WH7218> of the ram. <WH352>
And thou shalt slay <WH7819> <WH853> the ram, <WH352> and thou shalt take <WH3947> <WH853> his blood, <WH1818> and sprinkle <WH2236> it round about <WH5439> upon <WH5921> the altar. <WH4196>

And thou shalt cut <WH5408> the ram <WH352> in pieces, <WH5409> and wash <WH7364> the inwards <WH7130> of him, and his legs, <WH3767> and put <WH5414> them unto <WH5921> his pieces, <WH5409> and unto <WH5921> his head. <WH7218>

And thou shalt burn <WH6999> <WH853> the whole <WH3605> ram <WH352> upon the altar: <WH4196> it <WH1931> is a burnt offering <WH5930> unto the LORD: <WH3068> it is a sweet <WH5207> savor, <WH7381> an offering made by fire <WH801> unto the LORD. <WH3068>

And thou shalt take <WH3947> <WH853> the other <WH8145> ram; <WH352> and Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> shall put <WH5564> <WH853> their hands <WH3027> upon <WH5921> the head <WH7218> of the ram. <WH352>

Then shalt thou kill <WH7819> <WH853> the ram, <WH352> and take <WH3947> of his blood, <WH4480> <WH1818> and put <WH5414> it upon <WH5921> the tip <WH8571> of the right ear <WH241> of Aaron, <WH175> and upon <WH5921> the tip <WH8571> of the right <WH3233> ear <WH241> of his sons, <WH1121> and upon <WH5921> the thumb <WH931> of their right <WH3233> hand, <WH3027> and upon <WH5921> the great toe <WH931> of their right <WH3233> foot, <WH7272> and sprinkle <WH2236> <WH853> the blood <WH1818> upon <WH5921> the altar <WH4196> round about. <WH5439>

And thou shalt take <WH3947> of <WH4480> the blood <WH1818> that <WH834> is upon <WH5921> the altar, <WH4196> and of the anointing oil, <WH4480> <WH8081> <WH4888> and sprinkle <WH5137> it upon <WH5921> Aaron, <WH175> and upon <WH5921> his garments, <WH899> and upon <WH5921> his sons, <WH1121> and upon <WH5921> the garments <WH899> of his sons <WH1121> with <WH854> him: and he <WH1931> shall be hallowed, <WH6942> and his garments, <WH899> and his sons, <WH1121> and his sons' <WH1121> garments <WH899> with <WH854> him.

Also thou shalt take <WH3947> of <WH4480> the ram <WH352> the fat <WH2459> and the rump, <WH451> and the fat <WH2459> that covereth <WH3680> <WH853> the inwards, <WH7130> and the caul <WH3508> above the liver, <WH3516> and the two <WH8147> kidneys, <WH3629> and the fat <WH2459> that <WH834> is upon <WH5921> them, and the right <WH3225> shoulder; <WH7785> for <WH3588> it <WH1931> is a ram <WH352> of consecration: <WH4394>

And one <WH259> loaf <WH3603> of bread, <WH3899> and one <WH259> cake <WH2471> of oiled <WH8081> bread, <WH3899> and one <WH259> wafer <WH7550> out of the basket <WH4480> <WH5536> of the unleavened bread <WH4682> that <WH834> is before <WH6440> the LORD: <WH3068>

And thou shalt put <WH7760> all <WH3605> in <WH5921> the hands <WH3709> of Aaron, <WH175> and in <WH5921> the hands <WH3709> of his sons; <WH1121> and shalt wave <WH5130> them for a wave offering <WH8573> before <WH6440> the LORD. <WH3068>

And thou shalt receive <WH3947> them of their hands, <WH4480> <WH3027> and burn <WH6999> them upon the altar <WH4196> for <WH5921> a burnt offering, <WH5930> for a sweet <WH5207> savor <WH7381> before <WH6440> the LORD: <WH3068> it <WH1931> is an offering made by fire <WH801> unto the LORD. <WH3068>

And thou shalt take <WH3947> <WH853> the breast <WH2373> of the ram <WH4480> <WH352> of Aaron's <WH175> consecration, <WH4394> and wave <WH5130> it for a wave offering <WH8573> before <WH6440> the LORD: <WH3068> and it shall be <WH1961> thy part. <WH4490>

And thou shalt sanctify <WH6942> <WH853> the breast <WH2373> of the wave offering, <WH8573> and the shoulder <WH7785> of the heave offering, <WH8641> which <WH834> is waved, <WH5130> and which <WH834> is heaved up, <WH7311> of the ram <WH4480> <WH352> of the consecration, <WH4394> even of that which <WH4480> <WH834> is for Aaron, <WH175> and of that which <WH4480> <WH834> is for his sons: <WH1121>

And it shall be <WH1961> Aaron's <WH175> and his sons' <WH1121> by a statute <WH2706> forever <WH5769> from <WH4480> <WH854> the children <WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478> for <WH3588> it <WH1931> is a heave offering: <WH8641> and it shall be <WH1961> a heave offering <WH8641> from <WH4480> <WH854> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> of the sacrifice <WH4480> <WH2077> of their peace offerings, <WH8002> even their heave offering <WH8641> unto the LORD. <WH3068>

And the holy <WH6944> garments <WH899> of Aaron <WH175> shall be <WH1961> his sons' <WH1121> after <WH310> him, to be anointed <WH4886> therein, and to be consecrated <WH4390> <WH853> <WH3027> in them.

And that son <WH4480> <WH1121> that is priest <WH3548> in his stead <WH8478> shall put them on <WH3847> seven <WH7651> days, <WH3117> when <WH834> he cometh <WH935> into <WH413> the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150> to minister <WH8334> in the holy <WH6944> place.
And thou shalt take <WH3947> the ram <WH352> of the consecration, <WH4394> and seethe <WH1310> <WH853> his flesh <WH1320> in the holy <WH6918> place. <WH4725>

And Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> shall eat <WH398> <WH853> the flesh <WH1320> of the ram, <WH352> and the bread <WH3899> that <WH834> is in the basket, <WH5536> by the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation. <WH4150>

And they shall eat <WH398> those things wherewith <WH834> the atonement was made, <WH3722> to consecrate <WH4390> <WH853> <WH3027> and to sanctify <WH6942> them: but a stranger <WH2114> shall not <WH3808> eat <WH398> thereof, because <WH3588> they <WH1992> are holy. <WH6944>

And if <WH518> aught of the flesh <WH4480> <WH1320> of the consecrations, <WH4394> or of <WH4480> the bread, <WH3899> remain <WH3498> unto <WH5704> the morning, <WH1242> then thou shalt burn <WH8313> <WH853> the remainder <WH3498> with fire: <WH784> it shall not <WH3808> be eaten, <WH398> because <WH3588> it <WH1931> is holy. <WH6944>

And thus <WH3602> shalt thou do <WH6213> unto Aaron, <WH175> and to his sons, <WH1121> according to all <WH3605> things which <WH834> I have commanded <WH6680> thee: seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> shalt thou consecrate <WH4390> <WH3027> them.

And thou shalt offer <WH6213> every day <WH3117> a bullock <WH6499> for a sin offering <WH2403> for <WH5921> atonement: <WH3725> and thou shalt cleanse <WH2398> <WH5921> the altar, <WH4196> when thou hast made an atonement <WH3722> for <WH5921> it, and thou shalt anoint <WH4886> it, to sanctify <WH6942> it.

Seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> thou shalt make an atonement <WH3722> for <WH5921> the altar, <WH4196> and sanctify <WH6942> it; and it shall be <WH1961> an altar <WH4196> most holy: <WH6944> <WH6944> whatsoever <WH3605> toucheth <WH5060> the altar <WH4196> shall be holy. <WH6942>

Now this <WH2088> is that which <WH834> thou shalt offer <WH6213> upon <WH5921> the altar; <WH4196> two <WH8147> lambs <WH3532> of the first <WH1121> year <WH8141> day by day <WH3117> continually. <WH8548>
<WH853> The one <WH259> lamb <WH3532> thou shalt offer <WH6213> in the morning; <WH1242> and the other <WH8145> lamb <WH3532> thou shalt offer <WH6213> at <WH996> even: <WH6153>

And with the one <WH259> lamb <WH3532> a tenth deal <WH6241> of flour <WH5560> mingled <WH1101> with the fourth part <WH7253> of a hin <WH1969> of beaten <WH3795> oil; <WH8081> and the fourth part <WH7243> of a hin <WH1969> of wine <WH3196> for a drink offering. <WH5262>

And the other <WH8145> lamb <WH3532> thou shalt offer <WH6213> at <WH996> even, <WH6153> and shalt do <WH6213> thereto according to the meat offering <WH4503> of the morning, <WH1242> and according to the drink offering <WH5262> thereof, for a sweet <WH5207> savor, <WH7381> an offering made by fire <WH801> unto the LORD. <WH3068>

This shall be a continual <WH8548> burnt offering <WH5930> throughout your generations <WH1755> at the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150> before <WH6440> the LORD: <WH3068> where <WH834> <WH8033> I will meet <WH3259> you, to speak <WH1696> there <WH8033> unto <WH413> thee.
And there <WH8033> I will meet <WH3259> with the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> and the tabernacle shall be sanctified <WH6942> by my glory. <WH3519>

And I will sanctify <WH6942> <WH853> the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation, <WH4150> and the altar: <WH4196> I will sanctify <WH6942> also both Aaron <WH175> and his sons, <WH1121> to minister to me in the priest's office. <WH3547>
And I will dwell <WH7931> among <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> and will be <WH1961> their God. <WH430>

And they shall know <WH3045> that <WH3588> I <WH589> am the LORD <WH3068> their God, <WH430> that <WH834> brought them forth <WH3318> <WH853> out of the land <WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> that I may dwell <WH7931> among <WH8432> them: I <WH589> am the LORD <WH3068> their God. <WH430>
